TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITypeLibConverter

summary.span: 提供一组服务，这些服务将托管程序集转换为 COM 类型库或进行反向转换。

span.span: Provides a set of services that convert a managed assembly to a COM type library and vice versa.

MemberSignature.Value: public object ConvertAssemblyToTypeLib (System.Reflection.Assembly assembly, string typeLibName, System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibExporterFlags flags, System.Runtime.InteropServices.ITypeLibExporterNotifySink notifySink);

param.name: assembly
param.span: 要转换的程序集。

span.span: The assembly to convert.

param.name: typeLibName
param.span: 产生的类型库的文件名。

span.span: The file name of the resulting type library.

param.name: flags
param.span: 指示任何特殊设置的 值。

span.span: A value indicating any special settings.

param.name: notifySink
param.span: 由调用方实现的 接口。

span.span: The interface implemented by the caller.

summary.span: 将程序集转换为 COM 类型库。

span.span: Converts an assembly to a COM type library.

returns.span: 一个实现 接口的对象。

span.span: An object that implements the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息`ITypeLib`，请参阅 MSDN 库中的其现有文档。For more information on `ITypeLib`, please see its existing documentation in the MSDN library.

summary.span: 将 COM 类型库转换为程序集。

span.span: Converts a COM type library to an assembly.

param.span: 如果为 ，则接口要求在运行时检查，运行时检查需要堆栈审核且更加昂贵，但有助于提供更好的保护。

span.span: If , the interfaces require run time checks that require a stack walk and are more expensive, but help provide greater protection.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool GetPrimaryInteropAssembly (Guid g, int major, int minor, int lcid, out string asmName, out string asmCodeBase);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool GetPrimaryInteropAssembly(valuetype System.Guid g, int32 major, int32 minor, int32 lcid, [out] string& asmName, [out] string& asmCodeBase) cil managed
Public Function GetPrimaryInteropAssembly (g As Guid, major As Integer, minor As Integer, lcid As Integer, ByRef asmName As String, ByRef asmCodeBase As String) As Boolean

public: bool GetPrimaryInteropAssembly(Guid g, int major, int minor, int lcid, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % asmName, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % asmCodeBase);

param.name: g
param.span: 类型库的 GUID。

span.span: The GUID of the type library.

param.name: major
param.span: 类型库的主版本号。

span.span: The major version number of the type library.

param.name: minor
param.span: 类型库的次版本号。

span.span: The minor version number of the type library.

param.name: lcid
param.span: 类型库的 LCID。

span.span: The LCID of the type library.

param.name: asmName
param.span: 成功返回时，为与 g 相关联的主互操作程序集的名称。

span.span: On successful return, the name of the primary interop assembly associated with g.

param.name: asmCodeBase
param.span: 成功返回时，为与 g 相关联的主互操作程序集的基本代码。

span.span: On successful return, the code base of the primary interop assembly associated with g.

summary.span: 获取指定类型库的主互操作程序集的名称和基本代码。

span.span: Gets the name and code base of a primary interop assembly for a specified type library.

returns.span: 如果在注册表找到主互操作程序集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the primary interop assembly was found in the registry; otherwise .
